WHY DO WE BUY CHICKEN FROM THAILAND, IS THERE NOT ENOUGH FIRMS IN BRITAIN IF WE BOUGHT  OUR CHICKENS FROM BRITAIN WE WOULD BE CREATING JOBS THERE ARE THOUSANDS OF PEOPLE THAT WOULD LOVE A JOB SO WHY CANT WE CREATE MORE    WHAT DO WE KNOW ABOUT THE HEALTH AND HYGIENE OF THESE IMPORTED CHICKENS MACDONALDS SUPPLIER OSI GROUP IN SHANGHAI HUSI FOOD CO WAS CLOSED BECAUSE OF HYGIENE ISSUES SO WHY  CONTINUE TO IMPORT FROM THAILAND THE ECONOMY WOULD BE HELPED THROUGH BUYING BRITISH IT WOULD CREATE JOBS GET MORE MONEY INTO THE LOCAL FIRMS LIKE ASDA TESCO'S MORRISON S AND THE REST OF THE BIG FIRMS AND VARIOUS  RESTAURANTS
IT IS TIME WE STOOD UP AND SAID NO MORE
LETS GET OUR POULTRY FROM BRITAIN
